body_text:
Instead of using typeof, there's an API for getting the type of a preference that you'll want to use: nsiPrefBranch.getPrefType.
That interface is available on Services.prefs. RecipeRunner.jsm is an example of how to import and use that object.
body:
Instead of using `typeof`, there's an API for getting the type of a preference that you'll want to use: [nsiPrefBranch.getPrefType](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Mozilla/Tech/XPCOM/Reference/Interface/nsIPrefBranch#getPrefType()).

That interface is available on `Services.prefs`. `RecipeRunner.jsm` is an example of how to import and use that object.
body_html:
Instead of using typeof, there's an API for getting the type of a preference that you'll want to use: nsiPrefBranch.getPrefType.

That interface is available on Services.prefs. RecipeRunner.jsm is an example of how to import and use that object.
